title: Base Contracts - Dm5 Register Device
custom_steps: WHEN user executes a POST request to https://media-gateway.mlb.com/graphql WTIH registerDevice mutation
custom_expected: THEN the returned JSON object adheres to the Pact.IO consumer contract
